DOC.brief_title: Conjunctival Flora Patterns After Serial Intravitreal Injections Diabetic Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The study design enroll patient Diabetes Mellitus 18 year age diagnosis diabetic retinopathy diabetic macular edema , determine treat physician require least 3 serial injection anti-VEGF agent . After sign informed consent , conjunctival culture perform participant ' eye baseline subsequent injection . Prior injection use povidone-iodine drop , conjunctival culture take swab inferior fornix . Another culture take twenty minute injection . We culture swab sample blood chocolate agar plate . All patient ask complete questionnaire regard sign symptom injection ( like burn sensation , itching , discharge , tear etc ) . The following routine procedure use intravitreal injection : local anesthesia use Oxybuprocaine hydrochloride , ocular surface eyelid sterilization topical povidone-iodine 4 % . Intravitreal injection 3.5 mm perform posterior limbus pseudophakic patient 4 mm injection perform posterior limbus phakic patient use 30 gauge needle . The exclusion criterion consist patient receive prior intraocular injection either eye , current use contact lens , chronic use ophthalmic medication , ocular surgery within past 6 month , use systemic antibiotic within past 6 month know allergy contraindication povidone-iodine proparacaine . The study plan enroll 50 patient .
